tool_description: Creates structured knowledge base articles with proper formatting, sections, and initial content organization based on provided information and templates.

title.description: The main title of the knowledge base article

content_type.description: Type of article: FAQ, How-to, Troubleshooting, Policy, or Reference

primary_content.description: Main body content of the article

target_audience.description: Intended audience: Customer, Agent, Manager, or Technical

urgency_level.description: Content urgency: Low, Medium, High, or Critical

include_examples.description: Whether to include example scenarios in the article

error_messages: Invalid content type: Must be one of FAQ, How-to, Troubleshooting, Policy, or Reference
Invalid target audience: Must be one of Customer, Agent, Manager, or Technical
Invalid urgency level: Must be one of Low, Medium, High, or Critical
Empty title or content: Title and primary_content cannot be empty strings
Content too long: Primary content must be under 50000 characters to ensure readability
usage: Provide title, content_type, primary_content, and target_audience. Optionally specify urgency_level, related_topics array, and include_examples boolean to customize the article structure and content.

article_id.description: Unique identifier for the created article

formatted_content.description: Properly structured article content with sections

word_count.description: Total word count of the article content

content_structure.description: List of section headings in the article
